example.name: simple transitive
example.text: It's now easier for the Transportation Department to block leveraged buy-outs in the airline industry.

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: Low test scores can block students' promotions.

example.name: with secondary predication
example.text: [The proposed Soviet redefinition]-2 is aimed at *trace*-2 blocking the US from developing lighter, more transportable high-technology tanks.

example.name: everything all together
example.text: John blocked Mary from completing her dissertation with his constant pestering.
